data.title: Biswanath Dari
data.text:
In my personal time, I prefer to go hiking, biking, running and spend time in nature with my better half. I personally enjoy mentoring students to train them to get into grad school and cope up with grad life for a better academic career as and when my time permits.

Assistant Professor, Klamath Basin Research and Extension Center, Oregon State University (Jan 2020 -) (Department of Crop and Soil Science)

Post-doctoral Fellow, Aberdeen Research and Extension center, University of Idaho (August 2017 to Dec 2019)

Post-doctoral Research Associate, Soil and Water Sciences Department and North Florida Research and Education Center, Institute of Food and Agricultural Sciences, University of Florida (September 2015 to August 2017)

Certified Analyst, UF/IFAS Analytical Services Laboratories (Extension Soil Testing Laboratory â€“ Analytical Research Laboratory), University of Florida, (August 2011 to November 2015)

Laboratory Manager, Environmental Soil Chemistry Laboratory, Soil and Water Sciences Department, University of Florida (August 2011 to September 2015).
